title: What Fed nominee Kevin Warsh's former colleagues told us about his leadership style
full_text:
What Fed nominee Kevin Warsh's former colleagues told us about his leadership style. Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick for Fed chair, is a good listener who seeks consensus, former colleagues say. That could shape how he would run the Fed.. Former Federal Reserve Gov. Kevin WarshBloomberg/Getty Images
  • President Donald Trump nominated Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve chair.
